title: Ramayana: The Legend of Prince Rama
story line: An anime adaptation of the Hindu epic the Ramayana, where Lord Ram combats the wicked king Ravana.

title: Rocketry: The Nambi Effect
story line: Based on the life of Indian Space Research Organization scientist Nambi Narayanan, who was framed for being a spy and arrested in 1994. Though free, he continues to fight for justice against the officials who falsely implicated him.

title: Nayakan
story line: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.

title: Gol Maal
story line: A man's simple lie to secure his job escalates into more complex lies when his orthodox boss gets suspicious.

title: 777 Charlie
story line: Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

title: Anbe Sivam
story line: Two men, one young and arrogant, the other damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.

title: Jai Bhim
story line: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

title: Pariyerum Perumal
story line: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.

title: 3 Idiots
story line: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

title: Manichithrathazhu
story line: When a forbidden room in an old bungalow is unbolted, the spirit of a vengeful dancer is unleashed.

title: #Home
story line: Oliver Twist (Indrans) wants to be tech-savvy and become a better companion to his two sons, who spend more time on their phones than with their loved ones.

title: Soorarai Pottru
story line: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

title: Black Friday
story line: A film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.

title: Kumbalangi Nights
story line: The film revolves around four brothers who share a love-hate relationship with each other. Their relationship progresses to another level when Saji, Boney, and Franky decide to help Bobby stand by his love.

title: C/o Kancharapalem
story line: Four unconventional love stories set in the town and including the people of Kancherapalem.

title: Like Stars on Earth
story line: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

title: Kireedam
story line: The life of a young man turns upside down when he intervenes in a dispute in order to rescue his father (a cop) from a ruthless local outlaw.

title: Dangal
story line: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

title: Kaithi
story line: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

title: Jersey
story line: A failed cricketer decides to revive his cricketing career in his late 30's despite everyone being skeptical of his ability to do so.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

title: Mayabazar
story line: Balarama promises Subhadra to get his daughter married to her son. But when the Pandavas loses their kingdom to the Kaurava's, Balarama breaks his promise.

title: Natsamrat
story line: After he retires, an aging theatre actor and his wife begin to feel unwanted by their children.

title: Drishyam 2
story line: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

title: Asuran
story line: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.

title: Sita Ramam
story line: An orphan soldier, Lieutenant Ram's life changes, after he gets a letter from a girl named Sita. He meets her and love blossoms between them. When he comes back to his camp in Kashmir,After he gets caught in jail, he sends a letter to Sita which won't reach her.

title: Thevar Magan
story line: The urbane son of a village chieftain struggles between his personal aspirations and those of his family.

title: Visaaranai
story line: Four labourers are tortured by the police to confess to a theft they have not committed.

title: Sarpatta Parambarai
story line: When Sarpatta Parambarai is challenged to a do-or-die match, will Kabilan, a young labourer, put on the gloves himself and lead his clan to victory, or be dissuaded by his disapproving mother and dangerous politics?

title: Thalapathi
story line: An orphan named Surya raised in a slum befriends a good crime boss named Devaraj and works for him. Their existence is threatened when a new honest district collector arrives.

title: Pather Panchali
story line: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

title: Nadodikkattu
story line: After losing their jobs in Kerala, Dasan and Vijayan decide to migrate to the Middle East. But they end up in Tamil Nadu where they are mistaken as two CID officers by a group of smugglers.

title: Drishyam
story line: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

title: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
story line: Two friends, attempting to start-up their own photo studio, come across shady dealings, corruption and murder, and must fight to bring the guilty to light.

title: Thani Oruvan
story line: Siddharth Abimanyu, an influential scientist, is involved in various illegal medical practices. Mithran, an efficient IPS officer, decides to expose him.

title: Sardar Udham
story line: A biopic detailing the 2 decades that Punjabi Sikh revolutionary Udham Singh spent planning the assassination of the man responsible for the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

title: Aparajito
story line: Following his father's death, a boy leaves home to study in Calcutta, while his mother must face a life alone.

title: Vada Chennai
story line: A young carrom player in north Chennai becomes a reluctant participant in a war between two warring gangsters.

title: Khosla Ka Ghosla!
story line: A Delhi-based retired middle-class man tries half-heartedly to get his land back from a swindling property dealer with the help of his sons and their friends.

title: Anniyan
story line: Ramanujam, who suffers from multiple personality disorder, works as a lawyer by day and a vigilante at night. He uses tips from the 'Garuda Purana' as his tools to expose various antisocial elements.

title: Raatchasan
story line: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

title: Chupke Chupke
story line: A newly wedded husband plays a practical joke on his wife's family with full support from his wife and friends.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
story line: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

title: Peranbu
story line: A single father tries to raise his daughter, who has cerebral palsy, even as she is beginning to wake up to her sexuality.

title: Drishyam
story line: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

title: Mahanati
story line: Biography of Savitri, an actress from South India movie industry, who ruled the industry for two decades during 50s and 60s.

title: Bangalore Days
story line: A fun roller coaster ride about three young people, Aju, Divya and Kuttan who are cousins, reach Bangalore to dream, discover and explore.

title: Satya
story line: An innocent man is embroiled in underworld after being falsely charged and sets out to punish the perpetrators who subjected his life to misery.

title: Premam
story line: A young man has three opportunities to find love. Will the third time be the charm?

title: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya
story line: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya is an authentic humorous investigative thriller revolving around the adventures of a detective based out of Nellore.

title: Devasuram
story line: Neelakandan squanders away the inheritance left by his father. However, his life turns upside down when his mother reveals a terrible secret on her deathbed that changes the course of his life.

title: Super Deluxe
story line: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged father, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
story line: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh, who was scarred by of the India-Pakistan partition.

title: Tumbbad
story line: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

title: Andhadhun
story line: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

title: Vikram Vedha
story line: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

title: Guide
story line: When mistaken to be a sage by some villagers, an ex-tour guide reflects on his past and lost love to search for spiritual wisdom to guide the villagers.

title: Chithram
story line: A woman hires a stranger to pose as her husband because she doesn't want her ailing father to know that her fiance broke their engagement.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
story line: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

title: Kannathil Muthamittal
story line: A little girl is told by her parents that she is adopted. Determined to find her real mother, she begs to be taken to Sri Lanka, where her mother works with a militant group of activists.

title: Vikram
story line: A high-octane action film where a special investigator is assigned a case of serial Killings, he finds the case is not what it seems to be and leading down this path is only going to end in a war between everyone involved.

title: Sairat
story line: In interior Maharashtra, a fisherman's son and a local politician's daughter fall in love against the restrictions of caste hierarchy.

title: Chhichhore
story line: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

title: Shahid
story line: The account of Human Rights lawyer Shahid Azmi, an ordinary citizen with an extraordinary commitment to justice.

title: Iruvar
story line: A struggling actor and a writer-politician become friends as young men and rise to great heights in cinema and politics respectively. But when both become contenders for the top political post in the state, a rift develops between them.

title: Paan Singh Tomar
story line: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

title: Swades
story line: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
story line: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

title: Spadikam
story line: A small-town criminal constantly clashes with his strict school headmaster father at the expense of their family lives.

title: Let's Go! India
story line: Kabir Khan, the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team, dreams of making his all-girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
story line: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

title: Thirst
story line: A talented but indigent poet Vijay struggles for love and recognition in this selfish world.

title: Mudhalvan
story line: A man accepts a challenge to act as the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu for one day only, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

title: Black
story line: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear, or speak, and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

title: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
story line: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.

title: Hera Pheri
story line: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

title: Drishyam 2
story line: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Vijay Salgaonkar be able to protect his family this time?

title: Papanasam
story line: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law after they commit an unexpected crime.

title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
story line: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

title: Pudhu Pettai
story line: After running away from his home, Kumar falls in with a gang and slowly rises through the ranks of the criminal underworld.

title: Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru
story line: A police officer retires after an accident during a case investigation. Years later, he is forced to relive the past as he narrates the story to his friend's son.

title: PK
story line: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of there religious views on there people.

title: Mandela
story line: A local barber's fate turns overnight when he becomes the single deciding vote in the village elections.

title: Queen
story line: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

title: Article 15
story line: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

title: Talvar
story line: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

title: Soodhu Kavvum
story line: Das, with his team, kidnap Arumai, son of a politician, who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise, when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.

title: OMG: Oh My God!
story line: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

title: Sarfarosh
story line: After his brother is killed and father severely injured by terrorists, a young med student quits his studies to join the Indian Police Service to wipe out the terrorists.

title: Sholay
story line: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

title: Udaan
story line: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

title: Barfi!
story line: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

title: Jigarthanda
story line: An aspiring director targets a ruthless gangster because he wants to make a violent gangster film. His discreet attempts to research the gangster fail miserably. Finally when he gets caught snooping, things hit the fan.

title: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
story line: The story of a young revolutionary who raised an armed resistance against the British rule in India.

title: Kaakkaa Muttai
story line: Two slum kids yearn to taste a pizza after being enticed by the pizza shop that has opened near their locality. What happens when they manage to find the money to buy one?

title: Ustad Hotel
story line: Faisi wants to go to UK to become a professional chef but circumstances force him to assist his grandfather in a small restaurant in Kozhikode city, changing his outlook on life forever.

title: Theeran Adhigaram Ondru
story line: Theeran, a police officer, is entrusted with the task to solve the mystery behind a series of murders. The only clue left behind is that all the murders are committed in the same pattern.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
story line: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

title: Rang De Basanti
story line: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

title: Angoor
story line: Based on Shakespeare's 'A Comedy of Errors', this is a story of identical twins (2 pairs) and mistaken identities.

title: Jana Gana Mana
story line: As a college professor's brutal murder sparks student unrest, a cop launches an investigation while a lawyer seeks justice in the the courtroom.

title: Kahaani
story line: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

title: Masaan
story line: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.

title: Maheshinte Prathikaaram
story line: Mahesh, a studio photographer and studio owner gets into a fight and loses. He ends up taking revenge which leads to certain realizations in his life.

title: A Wednesday
story line: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

title: Virumandi
story line: A temperamental farmer gets embroiled in a bloody clan feud in a southern Tamil Nadu village.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
story line: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

title: Shershaah
story line: Shershaah is the story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, whose bravery and unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

title: Baasha
story line: An auto driver, Manikam, desperately tries to hide his dark underworld side to keep his promise to his father.

title: Carry On, Munna Bhai
story line: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

title: Iqbal
story line: Iqbal, the deaf and mute son of a farmer, has a passion for the game of cricket and seeks the tutelage of a washed-up, alcoholic ex-player.

title: Kantara
story line: It involves culture of Kambala and Bhootha Kola. A human and nature conflict where Shiva is a rebel who defends his village and nature. A death leads to war between villagers and evil forces. Will he be able to regain peace in the village?

title: Pink
story line: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

title: Roja
story line: A woman from a village in Tamil Nadu marries a sophisticated city dweller and moves with him to Kashmir, where all is rosy - until he gets kidnapped by militants.

title: Pithamagan
story line: Chittan, a social outcast, has grown up in a cemetery. A drug dealer finds him a job in a cannabis farm. In prison, he meets a conman, Shakti. This friendship transforms him from his stony existence.

title: Anand
story line: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

title: Nil Battey Sannata
story line: A story about a single woman (a Mom) and dreams on her Daughter.

title: Kaun Pravin Tambe?
story line: An indian cricketer who shows persistence and hardwork to achieve his ultimate goal of playing a Ranji Trophy. At the penultimate stage of the career at a age when it is believed people's career ends, he starts a new chapter of his life.

title: Lucia
story line: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

title: Charulata
story line: The lonely wife of a newspaper editor falls in love with her visiting cousin-in-law, who shares her love for literature.

title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
story line: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

title: Omkara
story line: A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity in this adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Othello'.

title: A Northern Story of Valor
story line: The film offers an alternative version of the fight between two legendary Chekavars from Chanthu's perspective.

title: Bommarillu
story line: A young man realizes that he has to push back against his domineering father if he wants to find true happiness and love.

title: Section 375
story line: A celebrated Bollywood director Rohan Khurana stands accused by a female member of his crew, Anjali Dangle of having raped her at his residence.

title: Alai Payuthey
story line: After a difficult romance in a class-divided society, the love birds find out marriage is not what they thought it would be.

title: Bombay
story line: A Hindu man and a Muslim woman fall in love in a small village and move to Mumbai, where they have two children. However, growing religious tensions and erupting riots threaten to tear the family apart.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
story line: In the 1970s, a gangster goes undercover as a slave to assassinate the owner of a notorious gold mine.

title: Rangasthalam 1985
story line: Chitti Babu begins to suspect his elder brother's life is in danger after they team up to lock horns with their village president and overthrow his unlawful 30 year old regime.

title: Indian
story line: A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
story line: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

title: Haider
story line: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

title: Mughal-E-Azam
story line: A 16th century prince falls in love with a court dancer and battles with his emperor father.

title: Athadu
story line: A gunman for hire is framed for murder, and assumes a dead man's identity while hiding from the police.

title: The Great Indian Kitchen
story line: After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be. The story follows her journey, as she changes herself and, even more so, changes the household.

title: Andaz Apna Apna
story line: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

title: Special 26
story line: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

title: Maqbool
story line: The intrigue of the Shakespearean tragedy 'Macbeth' is transposed to the Mumbai underworld.

title: Vaaranam Aayiram
story line: A father and son help each other through growing up, romance, tragedy, and adventure.

title: Thadam
story line: The murder of a youngster creates confusion among cops when they discover the suspect has a lookalike.

title: Padaiyappa
story line: The death of Padaiyappa's father destroys his family. But his luck changes, and he is able to lead a prosperous life, until his nemesis plots to ruin his happiness once more.

title: Gulaal
story line: A law student witnesses deception, homicide, and crime after being elected as General Secretary of his college.

title: Maanaadu
story line: On the day of a public conference by the state's Chief Minister, his bodyguard and a police officer are stuck in a time loop.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
story line: In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes. While his allies look up to him, the government sees him as a threat to law and order. Rocky must battle threats from all sides for unchallenged supremacy.

title: Pelli Choopulu
story line: A wannabe businesswoman and a happy-go-lucky guy meet each other during an arranged marriage blind date but eventually team up to start a food truck on their own.

title: Ulidavaru Kandanthe
story line: A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, unraveling how they and their lives are intertwined with it.

title: Deewaar
story line: Vijay struggles as a dockworker and eventually becomes a leading figure of the underworld, while his younger brother Ravi is an educated, upright policeman. This divide causes problems in their relationship.

title: Company
story line: A small-time gangster named Chandu teams up with Malik, a low-level enforcer for a criminal syndicate. Together they eliminate all their enemies, becoming the most feared gangsters in Mumbai.

title: Vaastav: The Reality
story line: Consequences force an innocent man to get involved in crime after making an error.

title: Ugly
story line: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

title: Badhaai Ho
story line: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.

title: Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom
story line: A young man forgets a few years of his life, even as he is about to get married.

title: Padosan
story line: A simple man from a village falls in love with his new neighbor. He enlists the help of his musical-theater friends to woo the lovely girl-next-door away from her music teacher.

title: Gully Boy
story line: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

title: Kshanam
story line: Rishi, a non-resident Indian, returns to India to help his ex-lover find her kidnapped daughter.

title: Evaru
story line: Sub-inspector Vikram Vasudev is entrusted with the task of investigating the murder of a high ranking officer who was killed by his alleged rape victim. When he delves deeper into the case he uncovers some surprising facts.

title: Aadukalam
story line: In a village in South India, rearing roosters, maintaining them and using them for fights are a way of life and a matter of honor and lifeline to many people.

title: My Name Is Khan
story line: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

title: Nayattu
story line: Three police officers who are on a run for life, escaping the outbreak against them due to the unlawful arrest and torture of a civilian. It brings in a few shades of arrogant yet very much human police officers and their helplessness.

title: Dev.D
story line: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

title: Maanagaram
story line: Four youngsters arrive in a big city and their lives become interlinked.

title: Major
story line: Based on the life of Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan, who was martyred in action during the November 2008 Mumbai attacks and was consequently awarded the Ashoka Chakra, India's highest peacetime gallantry award, on 26 January 2009.

title: Thondi Muthalum Driksakshiyum
story line: Prasad and Sreeja enter wedlock and move to a new place to continue the rest of their lives. Unfortunate events begin to take place after Prasad, a small-time thief, robs Sreeja's gold chain during a bus journey.

title: Pranchiyettan and the Saint
story line: Pranchiyettan is a successful businessman who often has talks with an imaginary St. Francis of Assisi. The story deals with how he goes about changing his embarrassing image to making a name for himself using wealth and contacts.

title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
story line: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

title: Garuda Gamana Vrishabha Vahana
story line: Set in the backdrop of the coastal and cultural city of modern-day Mangaluru, Hari and his soulmate Shiva rise together to great heights only to face off as bitter enemies resulting to their own downfall and destruction.

title: 22 Shey Shraban
story line: An ex-cop is hired to track down a serial killer who carries out his killings according to Bengali poetry.

title: Take Off
story line: In 2014, a group of Malayali nurses was captured when terrorists took over the city of Tikrit in Iraq. This movie recounts the ordeal suffered by the nurses following their capture.

title: Jab We Met
story line: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

title: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
story line: Using only a hammer and a chisel, a man spends twenty-two years carving a road through a treacherous mountain.

title: Ayyappanum Koshiyum
story line: The story revolves around the clash between Ayyappan, a senior police officer who serves at the Attappadi Police Station and Havildar Koshi, who comes to the village with a motive.

title: Ship of Theseus
story line: The film explores questions of identity, justice, beauty, meaning and death through an experimental photographer, an ailing monk and a young stockbroker.

title: The Brawler
story line: A boxer struggles to make his mark in the boxing world.

title: Charlie
story line: A young, nonconforming woman named Tessa gets entangled in a cat-and-mouse chase in the by-lanes of Kerala, hunting for a mysterious artist who previously lived in her apartment.

title: Border
story line: In 1971, along the border region of Longewala, a small battalion of Indian soldiers goes up against a large Pakistani strike force.

title: Deiva Thirumagal
story line: A man with disabilities fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter, and in the process teaches his opponent lawyer the value of love and family.

title: Vedam
story line: Stories of 5 people, an educated slum dweller, an aspiring rock star, an old villager, a prostitute and an ostracized Muslim man; all lead up to a night in a hospital filled with jeopardy.

title: Dil Bechara
story line: The emotional journey of two hopelessly-in-love youngsters; a young girl, Kizie, who is suffering from cancer; and Manny, a boy Kizie meets at a support group.

title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
story line: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning
story line: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

title: Salaam Bombay!
story line: Young Krishna struggles to survive among the drug dealers, pimps, and prostitutes in the back alleys and gutters of India.

title: Arjun Reddy
story line: Arjun Reddy, a short tempered house surgeon gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

title: Karnan
story line: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

title: Pad Man
story line: Upon realizing the extent to which women are affected by their menses, a man sets out to create a sanitary pad machine and to provide inexpensive sanitary pads to the women of rural India.

title: Ankhon Dekhi
story line: After a distressing incident, a Delhi man vows to believe only what he can see, but his new ideals soon take his life in extreme directions.

title: Baby
story line: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

title: Love Today
story line: Two young lovers, who are made to exchange their phones for a day and what happens due to that.

title: The Music Room
story line: Depicts the end days of a decadent zamindar (landlord) in Bengal, and his efforts to uphold his family prestige even when faced with economic adversity.

title: Kirik Party
story line: Kirik Party is the story of a gang of mischievous students, lead by the protagonist Karna (Rakshit Shetty), who has just joined an engineering college.

title: Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa
story line: An aspiring filmmaker goes through the ups and downs of romance when he falls for a Christian woman who says she only wants to be friends.

title: Super 30
story line: Based on the life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.

title: The Tashkent Files
story line: Revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.

title: Malik
story line: A past ridden with crime, death and pain is recounted to Freddy, a juvenile criminal, who has been assigned to eliminate his estranged uncle Sulaiman, an aging patriarch, while behind bars.

title: Hindi Medium
story line: A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.

title: Pizza
story line: A pizza delivery boy lands in a mysterious circumstance and it works a dramatic change in his life.

title: Android Kunjappan Ver 5.25
story line: Story of a conventional, conservative small town villager and his son who has to move away from home due to his profession. Their relationship gets an endearing twist when an AI humanoid enters their lives and fills in their emptiness.

title: Hridayam
story line: The emotional journey of Arun, his carefree bachelor days in engineering college, and how he matures through various phases of life.

title: English Vinglish
story line: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

title: Lakshya
story line: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

title: Johnny Gaddaar
story line: Police officers recount a tale of missing money which results in lies, deceit, betrayal and death.

title: Memories
story line: Sam Alex, a drunkard ex-cop, is forced to investigate a series of murders which are committed in the same pattern. His search leads to a serial killer, and something more than what he expected.

title: Dor
story line: Two woman --different backgrounds, miles apart, and strangers to each other-- are linked by tragedy. Their new-found friendship is tested as one holds the fate of the other's husband in her hands.

title: Hey Ram
story line: Saketh Ram's wife is raped and killed during direct action day riots in Calcutta. He is convinced that Mahatma Gandhi is responsible for all the problems happening in the country and sets out to kill him.

title: Joseph
story line: The story develops through the life of four retired policemen. It has the tone of a thriller investigation. An issue affecting the life of Joseph, the central character, and his family is being investigated.

title: Airlift
story line: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

title: RRR
story line: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in the 1920s.

title: Anjaam Pathiraa
story line: The police are on the trail of a serial killer, but with the victims being fellow officers, will they be able to catch the killer and solve the case in time?

title: Kaakha..Kaakha: The Police
story line: After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.

title: Gangaajal
story line: An IPS officer motivates and leads a dysfunctional, corrupt police force of Tezpur to fight against the corrupt politician.

title: Okkadu
story line: A Kabbadi player rescues a young woman from an unwanted marriage and hides her in his home.

title: Pokiri
story line: A money-minded criminal has to deal with two rival gangs as well as an evil cop threatening his girlfriend.

title: Thuppakki
story line: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

title: The Lunchbox
story line: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

title: Vettaiyaadu Vilaiyaadu
story line: A Police Officer investigates a series of brutal rapes and murders, with the culprits seeming to cover more than one country.

title: Ab Tak Chhappan
story line: An honest encounter specialist's life begins to change with the arrival of a new police commissioner who has ties with a local don.

title: Mumbai Police
story line: ACP Antony is the only one who knows the truth behind ACP Aaryan's murder. Antony meets with an accident, losing his memory and is unable to reveal the killer. He is forced to investigate the murder again hoping that he remembers something.

title: Ghilli
story line: Velu, an aspiring kabaddi player, goes to Madurai to participate in a regional match, where he rescues Dhanalakshmi from Muthupandi, a powerful man keen on marrying the girl against her will.

title: Manam
story line: Through reincarnation, family members are able to cross generations and meddle in each others' lives.

title: Unnaipol Oruvan
story line: A retiring police officer remembers a thrilling case of his life which is not recorded in any case files.

title: RangiTaranga
story line: Mysterious events begin to unfold after a reclusive novelist and his wife move back to her ancestral village, followed by a journalist.

title: Veer-Zaara
story line: "Veer-Zaara" is a saga of love, separation, courage, and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.

title: Angamaly Diaries
story line: Vincent Pepe who wanted to be a powerful leader of a righteous gang that ruled the city, like his seniors. And then there's the rival clan with the malicious gangsters of Angamaly a locale on which the film is based.

title: Vicky Donor
story line: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

title: Kaththi
story line: A case of mistaken identity embroils an escaped convict in a fight against a large corporation intent on seizing a village's land.

title: Oopiri
story line: Impressed by his carefree attitude, quadriplegic multi-billionaire Vikram hires a convict out on parole as his caretaker. What follows is a string of life lessons they learn from each other.

title: Mother India
story line: In this melodrama, a poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations. But no matter the struggles, she always sticks to her own moral code.

title: Secret Superstar
story line: A talented teenage singer-songwriter living amid domestic abuse becomes a YouTube sensation after a video in which she hides her identity goes viral.

title: Stanley Ka Dabba
story line: A school-teacher, who forces children to share their food with him, forbids one from entering the school until he brings his own Tiffin/Lunch-box.

title: Thulladha Manamum Thullum
story line: Kutty is a good-hearted soul, but unfortunate incidents tend to portray his ruffian side whenever he encounters the girl he loves. A bizarre incident brings them closer and yet keeps them apart.

title: Nayak: The Real Hero
story line: A man accepts a challenge by the chief minister of Maharashtra to run the state for one day, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

title: Rock On!!
story line: Four friends reunite to relive their moments of glory as a rock band.

title: Udta Punjab
story line: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.

title: Mimi
story line: Mimi is introduced by Bhanu to an American couple as a surrogate in exchange for Rs 2 million. She decides to have the baby even when they change their mind and tells her parent that Bhanu is the father.

title: Sonchiriya
story line: Set in the Chambal valley, the film follows the story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorized the Indian heartlands.

title: Oru CBI Diary Kurippu
story line: Prabhakara Varma is called upon to investigate the death of Omana, the daughter-in-law of a local businessman. It looks like a suicide but, Varma is sure that is not so.

title: Ayirathil Oruvan
story line: Anitha, a government official, embarks on a journey to find Chandramouli, an archaeologist, who went to Vietnam to search for any existence of the prince of the Chola dynasty.

title: Badla
story line: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

title: Happy Days
story line: A group of eight youngsters from an engineering college form an unbreakable friendship after going through various struggles.

title: Dasvidaniya
story line: A man who loves to make "to-do lists" makes one last bucket list when he realizes he is about to die.

title: Raazi
story line: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

title: Kai Po Che
story line: Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.

title: Dia
story line: Dia takes three years to confess her feelings to Rohith but after a terrible accident, she is told he does not survive. Later, when she starts seeing Adi, she finds out that Rohith is still alive.

title: Poove Unakkaga
story line: When a man realizes that the Hindu woman he loves is in love with a Christian man, he decides to sacrifice his love and unite their families so as to make the love story a success.

title: Minnal Murali
story line: An unusual event creates a lightning which in turns gives superhuman abilies to an ambitious tailor ,whose responsibility is now to protect his home village from the evil plans of the antagonist.

title: Thiruchitrambalam
story line: Thiruchitrambalam lives with his father and grandfather. He blames the former for the loss of his mother and sister and is not on good terms with the latter. Meanwhile, his love life is not so successful.

title: Goodachari
story line: A young NSA agent is framed for the murder of his bosses making him realize that now his mission is darker than expected and has some personal scores to settle regarding his father's death, a former NSA agent.

title: Joji
story line: Joji, an engineering dropout and the youngest son of a rich family lives with his aspirations of becoming super wealthy. Driven by greed and blind ambition, he decides to execute his plans following an unexpected event in the family.
